Nightlight/Termitron/Trinity:

"I have a question, Grounded"said Nightlight "Should be good Idea 
that Trinity, came in and out freely? she could leave the base 
without know it and get hurt or worse"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Grounded::
> Grounded saw the three come up to the bridge.  
> "Ah welcome....To get your inscription code just plug in and i will 
> perform a write to your Chivtron codes allowing the shields to open 
> for you.  Each code is unique so we will know who entre the bases 
> when and where. This is strictly for defense purposes only.  "
>

was

online

a
